CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 3.1.0)

PROJECT (twsapi CXX)
MESSAGE("start compiling CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME = ${CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME}")

#ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(lib)
AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(client  TWSAPI_SRC_DIR )
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(. TWSAPI_INCLUDE_DIR)

SET(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib)

ADD_LIBRARY(${CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME} SHARED ${TWSAPI_SRC_DIR})
